name: Rocket Rally
description:
Rocket Rally

Become the masterer of rockets. Rocket Rally is an online multiplayer deathmatch game for god knows how many players. If the server is empty - call some friends.

Currently there is only one server online. It restarts every 10 minutes. Use those 10 minutes to dominate. Every player can set a personal gravity - meaning you decide on which planet you are standing on or falling towards.

Move: WASD
Jump:  Space
Fire:  Mouse Left
Change Planet:  Mouse Right
Change rocket type:  Q
There are two rocket types right now:
Normal - flying straight
Personal gravity - this one needs to lock on a planet before shooting. Use this to hit turned away side of planets.

This project is in development - it's rough - have fun.
